data.title: Stabil i4: A Robotic 3-axis Camera Gimbal Stabilizer by by Igor Zhuk — Kickstarter
data.name: Igor Zhuk
data.description: A versatile and easy-to-use 3 axis robotic camera stabilizer that allows anyone to capture stunning cinematic footage anywhere!

data.title: Quebee: Your Own Personal Cameraman by Quebee Inc — Kickstarter
data.name: Quebee Inc
data.description: Quebee is the personal video camera that allows YOU to be in the moment. It’s your own personal camera man - you are part of the show.
